extension.news:
+ 2017.09.20 - Fixes for ordered dict import for Kodi 16 - Rebased on upstream 0.8.1 release - Removed dependency for shutil_which & singledispatch
+ 2017.09.06 - Fixes for relative imports
+ 2017.09.05 - Added dependency for streamlink plugins - Updated to commit/f26733cfc83156db32f9721cca71ebf3b86e0dbd - Added websocket module in utils directory
+ 2017.08.30 - Removed dependency for pycountry & ordereddict
+ 2017.07.19 - Fixed temp folder on Android
+ 2017.07.17.2 - update import
+ 2017.07.17.1 - Merged Plugins into the same Kodi Plugin
+ 2017.07.17 - streamlink 5f658c8199690253dde8868b7ae0714f0cc5d88a - Renamed crypto.py -> cryptofix.py - use pycountry and streamlink.crypto
